NK036(chi)016:1: // nyams len lag khrigs ma'i khrid ngo mtshar can bzhugs so //
NK036(chi)016:2: rang bzhin ston pa kun tu bzang po dang //
NK036(chi)016:3: longs spyod rdzogs sku dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //
NK036(chi)016:4: thub pa sprul sku rdo rje sems dpa' la //
NK036(chi)016:5: lus ngag yid gsum gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //
NK036(chi)016:6: rgyal ba nyid tshul dga' rab rdo rje dang //
NK036(chi)016:7: 'jam dpal bshes gnyen sh+r+ai sing ha dang //
NK036(chi)016:8: dz+ny+aa na s+au tra bi ma mi tra sogs //
NK036(chi)016:9: mkhas grub bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK036(chi)016:10: rgyal bas gsungs pa'i theg pa kun gyi rtse //
NK036(chi)016:11: bcu bdun rgyud dang dpe rgyud dum bu dang //
NK036(chi)016:12: man ngag brgya dang bcu dgu kun gyi snying //
NK036(chi)016:13: zangs yig can gyi lag khrigs nyams len bshad //
NK036(chi)016:14: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis thabs mkhas la thugs rje phun sum tshogs pas /
NK036(chi)016:15: theg pa rim pa dgu pa dang sde snod gsum gsungs shing /
NK036(chi)016:16: de thams cad kyi yang rtse rnal 'byor bla na med pa la bskyed pa dang /
NK036(chi)016:17: bskyed rdzogs mtshams sbyor ba dang /
NK036(chi)016:18: rdzogs rim las 'dir rdzogs pa'i rim pa /
NK036(chi)016:19: de las kyang sems sde dang /
NK036(chi)016:22: rang bzhin spros bral du ston pa las kyang ches rmad du byung ba /
NK036(chi)016:24: nang dran pa ltar ngo bo ston pa dang /
NK036(chi)016:25: gsang skor snying ltar dpe rtags su don ngo sprod
NK036(chi)016:26: par byed pa las de thams cad kyi spros pa
NK036(chi)016:27: bcad nas yang gsang bla na med pa'i rgyud bcu
NK036(chi)016:28: bdun dang / man ngag brgya dang bcu dgu thams
NK036(chi)016:29: cad kyang don yi ge ma ru ma bu lngar
NK036(chi)016:30: bdun dang / 'dus pa las / 'di la gsum /
NK036(chi)016:31: gdams pa ston byed bla ma dang /
NK036(chi)016:35: rgyud dang man ngag thams cad nas mang du gsungs kyang mdor brjod na /
NK036(chi)016:37: dag cing dbang po ma nyams dang //
NK036(chi)016:38: mang du thos shing nga rgyal zhing //
NK036(chi)016:39: tshul 'chos spangs shing chog shes pa //
NK036(chi)016:40: rgyud la goms shing nyams su len //
NK036(chi)016:41: lta ba rtogs shig 'dzin chags chung //
NK036(chi)016:42: bya ba nyung zhig brtson 'grus ldan //
NK036(chi)016:43: rmongs pa med cing chog shes pa //
NK036(chi)016:44: yang na sdom pa gsum la gnas //
NK036(chi)016:45: dka' thub sdom zhing mchog la sbyor //
NK036(chi)016:46: nags khrod brten pa bla ma'o //
NK036(chi)016:50: e ma dad dang snying rje yangs pa che //
NK036(chi)016:51: dbang po rno zhing ngag 'jam dul tshig smra //
NK036(chi)016:52: bla ma la gus tshig gi spros pa chod //
NK036(chi)016:53: ma brtags gsang tshig gzhan du rdul tsam yang //
NK036(chi)016:54: brjod par mi byed nyams len 'di la brtson //
NK036(chi)016:55: 'di ni gsang sngags gsang ba'i snod yin pas //
NK036(chi)016:57: de ltar dpon slob mtshan nyid brtags pa gal che'o //
NK036(chi)016:58: gdams ngag la khrid dang ngo sprod dang tshangs sprugs gdab pa gsungs kyang /
NK036(chi)016:59: don gyi dbang bzhi dang 'brel ba dang /
NK036(chi)016:60: nyams len lag khrigs bcu drug gi khrid gnyis yin no //
NK036(chi)016:61: gzhan yang lag khrid kyi rim pa du ma yod kyang 'dir 'dus pas /
NK036(chi)016:62: man ngag gi de bas na 'di ltar bya bar gsungs so //
NK036(chi)016:64: dngos gzhi sems gtan la dbab pa dang /
NK036(chi)016:65: rim pa mngon sum rtogs par bya ba dang /
NK036(chi)016:66: rjes yid ches bskyed pa'i rgyab brten bshad cing nyams
NK036(chi)016:67: su len pa'i rtags tshad 'bras bu dang bcas pa'o
NK036(chi)016:68: // dang po nyams su len pa des spros bcas kyi dbang ngam /
NK036(chi)016:69: yang na rgyud sde gzhan gyis kyang rung ste /
NK036(chi)016:70: dbang legs par thob par byas la bla ma bsten
NK036(chi)016:71: te nges shes skye zhing byin rlabs 'jug par bya
NK036(chi)016:72: ba'i phyir bla ma'i rnal 'byor ni /
NK036(chi)016:73: 'di nyid kyi rdo rje lam bstan nas /
NK036(chi)016:74: thun mtshams thams cad du byin rlabs kyi rtsa ba yin pas /
NK036(chi)016:75: des na rang gi spyi bo'i gtsug tu nyi ma dang zla ba'i gdan la /
NK036(chi)016:76: bla ma dang sangs rgyas thams cad dbyer med du
NK036(chi)016:77: rdo rje sems dpa' gang yang rung bar bsgoms la
NK036(chi)016:78: / 'di'i mthe bong las byang chub sems kyi chu
NK036(chi)016:79: rgyun bdag gi spyi bo tshangs pa'i bu gar thim
NK036(chi)016:80: / nas / de la gsol ba btab pas /
NK036(chi)016:81: lus kyi 'khor lo bzhi rim gyis gang zhing /
NK036(chi)016:82: lus sems zag pa med pa'i bde bas myos pa la sems bzhag na /
NK036(chi)016:83: lus bde ba dang ldan zhing sems la chos nyid kyi don 'char ro //
NK036(chi)016:84: zhes byung bas de ltar nyams su blang bar bya'o //
NK036(chi)016:85: de'i thun mtshams su lus rdo rje rtse gsum pa'i 'khrul 'khor /
NK036(chi)016:87: lag pas spyi bor thal mo sbyar lus rdo rje sngon por bsgoms te /
NK036(chi)016:89: zhes bshad pas thun re tsam bya'o //
NK036(chi)016:90: sngon 'gro'i dum bu ste dang po'o //
NK036(chi)016:91: de nas sems sbyang bar bya'o //
NK036(chi)016:96: dum bur bstan kyang 'dir nyams len du bstan pa ni //
NK036(chi)016:97: dang po dpon slob gnyis ka lus bde bar byas te /
NK036(chi)016:98: bla ma la man+dala phul la bla mas bstan par bya'o //
NK036(chi)016:99: thog mar mi rtag pa la bsams te /
NK036(chi)016:100: byang chub kyi sems sbyong ba ni /
NK036(chi)016:101: 'o skol rnams sngar 'khor ba 'dir thog ma med pa nas /
NK036(chi)016:102: yul snang 'khrul pa la bden cing rtag par bzung
NK036(chi)016:103: bas 'khor bar 'khyams pa'i rgyur gyur pa yin pas
NK036(chi)016:104: / mi rtag pa dran par bya'o //
NK036(chi)016:105: de yang rang nyid skyes nas rim pas 'chi ba dang nye bar gyur te nges par 'chi la /
NK036(chi)016:107: gnyen gshes shi ba dang bral ba rnams yid la byas te /
NK036(chi)016:108: de ltar shi ba dang 'chi bar 'gyur ba rnams la gang yang phan pa gdags par bya'o //
NK036(chi)016:109: gzhan yang da ltar nyid kyang skad cig ma du
NK036(chi)016:110: ma 'das te 'chi ba la nye bar gyur te
NK036(chi)016:111: / sems can kun gyis de ltar mi rtag par
NK036(chi)016:112: ma shes pas rtag par re zhing sdod pa'i tshis
NK036(chi)016:113: du ma byas kyang thams cad bor te /
NK036(chi)016:114: ngan 'gro rnams su ltung zhing sdug bsngal bar 'gyur
NK036(chi)016:115: bas de ltar shes nas nges 'byung bsgom par bya'o
NK036(chi)016:116: // de ltar 'khor ba la blo ldog cing nges
NK036(chi)016:117: par mi rtag pa rgyud la skyes pa na brtan
NK036(chi)016:119: gnyis pa ni 'phral gyi bde ba dang yun gyi
NK036(chi)016:120: bde ba la bsams la byang chub kyi sems sbyong
NK036(chi)016:121: ba ni / kye ma ngan 'gro dmyal ba dang yi dwags dang /
NK036(chi)016:122: dud 'gro rnam la bde ba cung zad med la /
NK036(chi)016:123: lha dang mi rnams kyi gnas skabs kyi bde ba 'di yang /
NK036(chi)016:124: rgyu sbyin pa btang yang tshul khrims las byung ba yang rtag pa med par 'gyur te /
NK036(chi)016:125: mya ngan gyi gnas su 'gyur bar bka' mdo rgyud thams cad du gsungs pa mngon du 'gyur ro //
NK036(chi)016:126: gang gis kyang sngar dga' ba dang /
NK036(chi)016:127: bde ba myong ba rnams 'gyur ba dang /
NK036(chi)016:131: zas gos nor thams cad 'gyur bar yid ches so //
NK036(chi)016:133: de dag thams cad las mthar thug yun gyi bde ba cig thob dgos te /
NK036(chi)016:134: de ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi nges pa'i don gyi gdams pa zhi gnas dang lhag mthong bsgom zhing /
NK036(chi)016:135: 'khrul pa'i sems can thams cad la snying rje bsgom
NK036(chi)016:136: pa yin no snyam du bsgoms pas sdug bsngal la
NK036(chi)016:137: yid 'byung ba'i dgos pa yod cing /
NK036(chi)016:138: 'dus byas sdug bsngal du mthong ba'i tshad yin no //
NK036(chi)016:139: gsum pa rkyen du ma las bsams te byang chub kyi sems sbyong ba ni /
NK036(chi)016:140: da ltar sems can thams cad bde bar 'dod kyang bde ba'i rkyen nyung /
NK036(chi)016:144: mdor na 'khor ba 'di na byas pa'i las la
NK036(chi)016:145: lus ngag yid gsum skad cig kyang mi dal bar
NK036(chi)016:146: rkyen du ma la sbyor mod kyi /
NK036(chi)016:147: yang dag pa'i lam dang ma 'phrad cing nyams su
NK036(chi)016:148: ma blangs na rnam rtog gi rkyen gyis 'khor ba
NK036(chi)016:149: nas sems can 'di rnams thon pa'i dus mi 'dug
NK036(chi)016:150: pas / rang yang sngar 'khrul cing sems can gzhan yang snying re rje /
NK036(chi)016:151: zhes sbyangs pas dad pa sngon du 'gro zhing 'khor ba las yid 'byung ba'i dgos pa yod cing /
NK036(chi)016:152: rigs drug gi sems can la snying rje skye zhing
NK036(chi)016:153: las su dkon mchog mchod na ci ma rung snyam
NK036(chi)016:154: pa ni brtan pa'i tshad do //
NK036(chi)016:155: bzhi pa byas pa thams cad don med par 'dug
NK036(chi)016:156: pa la bsams te byang chub kyi sems sbyong ba
NK036(chi)016:157: ni / da lta rang lus ngag yid gsum gyis rang ba de ru re /
NK036(chi)016:158: longs spyod phun sum tshogs su re /
NK036(chi)016:160: de rnams ma byung gi dogs pas bya ba'i rnam
NK036(chi)016:161: pa mi dge ba sna tshogs la mi 'dzem par
NK036(chi)016:164: gsog 'jog du ma byed pa dang /
NK036(chi)016:165: rang nyid sang 'chi yang mi shes pas zas dang
NK036(chi)016:166: gos la sogs pas 'tsho ba'i chas du ma byed
NK036(chi)016:167: pa re 'khrul / don cung zad kyang med de
NK036(chi)016:168: sdig dang sdug pas longs spyod du ma bsags kyang
NK036(chi)016:169: pa re 'khrul / / dbang med par 'khor dang nye du thams cad dang /
NK036(chi)016:170: tha na lus kyang dor nas rang ngan 'gror 'gro dgos pa 'dis ci zhig bya /
NK036(chi)016:171: zhes nges par bsam par bya'o //
NK036(chi)016:172: des bla ma'i man ngag la 'jug par bya ba'i dgos pa yod cing /
NK036(chi)016:173: bla ma'i gdams ngag gcig ci nas kyang thor par bya'o snyam par skye ba ni tshad yin no //
NK036(chi)016:174: lnga pa sangs rgyas kyi yon tan la bsams te byang chub kyi sems sbyong ba ni /
NK036(chi)016:175: da lta'i sdug bsngal thams cad dang ni bral /
NK036(chi)016:176: yon tan thams cad ni thob /
NK036(chi)016:177: rang gzhan gyi don thams cad ni grub /
NK036(chi)016:180: pha rol tu phyin pa ni brnyes /
NK036(chi)016:181: de lta bu'i sangs rgyas de da res mi lus 'di'i thog nas ma thob na /
NK036(chi)016:182: shin tu dka' bar 'dug pas da res nas bla
NK036(chi)016:183: na med pa'i byang chub thob pa'i thabs la brtson
NK036(chi)016:184: 'grus bskyed par bya'o snyam par bya'o //
NK036(chi)016:185: des bsgom pa sran thub pa'i dgos pa yod cing /
NK036(chi)016:186: ci nas kyang ma bsgoms na sangs mi rgya bar
NK036(chi)016:187: 'dug pas brtson 'grus mi btang dgos snyam pa ni
NK036(chi)016:189: drug pa bla ma'i gdams ngag la bsams te byang chub kyi sems sbyong ba ni /
NK036(chi)016:190: 'khor ba thog med kyi sgrib pa lo zlas dag nus shing /
NK036(chi)016:191: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan lo zlas skyed nus la /
NK036(chi)016:192: bla ma'i gdams ngag sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
NK036(chi)016:193: dpa' thams cad kyi mngon du mdzad pa 'di 'dra
NK036(chi)016:194: dang phrad pa la bya ba gzhan gyis ni ci
NK036(chi)016:195: zhig bya / sgrub pa la brtson 'grus bskyed par bya'o snyam du bya'o //
NK036(chi)016:196: des bya ba gzhan la mi 'jug pa'i dgos pa yod cing /
NK036(chi)016:197: 'jig rten gyi longs spyod kyis ci zhig bya dar
NK036(chi)016:198: cig bsgoms kyang mi rtog pa skye ba'i grogs su
NK036(chi)016:199: 'dug snyam pa ni 'byongs pa'i tshad do //
NK036(chi)016:200: bdun pa rnam par mi rtog pa la bsams te byang chub kyi sems sbyong ba ni /
NK036(chi)016:201: de ltar bla na med pa'i byang chub thob pa
NK036(chi)016:202: la thab khyad par can rnam rtog g.yo ba bzung
NK036(chi)016:203: nas rnam par mi rtog pa la bslab par bya'o
NK036(chi)016:204: snyam du byas la rtog pa bzung zhing /
NK036(chi)016:205: sems skad cig kyang mi gnas pa rnams snying re rje zhes bsgom par bya'o //
NK036(chi)016:206: des byang chub kyi sems gong nas gong du 'phel ba'i dgos pa yod cing /
NK036(chi)016:207: gnas pa yun ring du song nas 'di la rtag
NK036(chi)016:208: tu goms par bya'o snyam pa ni brtan pa'i tshad
NK036(chi)016:209: do // de ltar sems sbyong bdun po 'di gal che ste /
NK036(chi)016:210: rgyab yig nas sprul sku'i sa bon bzhag pa'i phyir /
NK036(chi)016:211: sngon du 'di sbyang ba gal che bar bshad cing /
NK036(chi)016:212: dad pa drag po dang snying rje ma skyes na /
NK036(chi)016:213: gsang sngags kyi snod du mi rung bas 'di nyid sbyong du gzhug go //
NK036(chi)016:214: byang chub kyi sems sbyong ba bdun pa'i khrid kyi rim pa ste gnyis pa'o //
NK036(chi)016:215: de ltar sems 'byong pa de sngags kyi thabs lam la 'jug par bya ste /
NK036(chi)016:216: bskyed pa'i rim pa ni sngar rgyud smin pa dang gnas skabs kyi 'bras bu'i don du yin la /
NK036(chi)016:217: 'dir chags med rlung la bslab pa dang /
NK036(chi)016:218: chags can thig le la bslab pa gnyis gsungs te /
NK036(chi)016:219: dang po la yang shes par bya ba'i rtsa rlung
NK036(chi)016:220: gi bshad pa ni 'di nyid kyi rtsa gnas 'khor
NK036(chi)016:221: lo dang / rlung gi sdom byang nas gsungs te rgya che'o //
NK036(chi)016:222: 'dir ni gzhung 'di dang rlung gi pra khrid mchog
NK036(chi)016:223: bsgrub pa'i yan lag tu dgongs pa de bsdus nas
NK036(chi)016:225: lte bar skyed byed kyi 'khor lo dang /
NK036(chi)016:226: snying gar dran pa 'dus pa'i 'khor lo dang /
NK036(chi)016:227: mgrin par ro rnams 'dus pa'i 'khor lo dang /
NK036(chi)016:228: spyi bor rtse mo rnam par bkod pa'i 'khor lo bzhi dag par bya ba'i phyir /
NK036(chi)016:230: khrus dang bku mnye la sogs pa byas nas /
NK036(chi)016:231: dben par stan bde ba la 'dug nas lus rdo rje skyil krung bca' /
NK036(chi)016:232: lag pa mnyam bzhag gi phyag rgya bca' /
NK036(chi)016:233: rked pa bsrang mgrin par sgu bar byas la /
NK036(chi)016:234: de nas dmigs pa ni lnga ste /
NK036(chi)016:235: rlung gi kha dog la bslab pa dang /
NK036(chi)016:239: bum pa'i sbyor ba la bslab pa'o //
NK036(chi)016:240: dang po ni rlung ro bus la de nas rang
NK036(chi)016:241: gi smin mtshams su rlung thams cad 'dus pa'i ngo
NK036(chi)016:242: bo thig le zlum la dkar ba yungs kar tsam
NK036(chi)016:243: zhig la shes pa gtad la yun ring du bsgom
NK036(chi)016:244: / de nas rang gi ngo bo yang de'i mdog dang mtshungs par bsgom /
NK036(chi)016:247: de nas stong gsum tsam snang ba thams cad dkar
NK036(chi)016:248: mer mer ba la blo bzhag te yang nas yang
NK036(chi)016:254: de nas rlung gi thig le dkar la sngo ba
NK036(chi)016:255: sran ma tsam gcig smin mtshams nas sna rtser bsgoms
NK036(chi)016:256: la mig kyang lta stangs der gtad de /
NK036(chi)016:257: rlung dal la ring pa phyir btang bas thig le
NK036(chi)016:258: de hril li li phar song zhing lus sems stong
NK036(chi)016:260: tshur byung tsam na rngub pa dang bstun nas thig
NK036(chi)016:261: le smin mtshams su byung bas bsil sing ba la
NK036(chi)016:262: blo bzhag / grang ba che ba'am lus grang zhing
NK036(chi)016:263: 'dar na thig le tsha lhang lhang ba ltar bsgom
NK036(chi)016:264: blo bzhag / / des sems zin cing dmigs pa gang gtad sar de ltar snang na 'byongs pa'o //
NK036(chi)016:265: des kyang rnam rtog ma zin na /
NK036(chi)016:266: gsum pa grangs la bslab pa ni /
NK036(chi)016:267: lus sngar ltar byas la shes pa rlung dang 'gro ldog gcig tu bslab par bya ste /
NK036(chi)016:268: rlung phar 'gro tsa na shes pa yang dus gcig tu gtad la bsgom /
NK036(chi)016:269: tshur 'ong tsa na yang de bzhin du bya /
NK036(chi)016:270: de ltar 'gro 'ong gnyis gcig tu bgrangs pas gcig
NK036(chi)016:271: nas gnyis dang de bzhin du grangs bzung bas zhag
NK036(chi)016:272: gcig la rlung nyi khri chig stong drug brgya yod
NK036(chi)016:273: kyang / thun du bcad cing stong brgyad brgya'i bar tsam du shes pa ma yengs pa gal che /
NK036(chi)016:274: de nas rnam rtog gnas pa dang /
NK036(chi)016:275: rlung dbyung ba dang rngub pa phar tshur dal gyis
NK036(chi)016:276: je ring la btang bas tha mar yun ring du
NK036(chi)016:277: gnas shing sdod na 'byongs pa yin no //
NK036(chi)016:278: de nas bzhi pa 'gro 'ong la bslab pa ni /
NK036(chi)016:279: rang gi lte bar thod pa phyi dkar la nang
NK036(chi)016:280: dmar seng ngeb gcig gi nang du rlung gi rdo
NK036(chi)016:281: rje sngon po nas tsam zhig bsgoms te /
NK036(chi)016:282: rlung phyir gtong rtsa bar rgyang ring por lta nas song bar bsgom /
NK036(chi)016:283: tshur rngub tsa na thod pa'i nang du sngo mer gyis byung bar bsgom zhing /
NK036(chi)016:284: lus bde phril phril ba la blo bzhag /
NK036(chi)016:285: de nas rnam rtog gnas pa na tshur la rgyang
NK036(chi)016:286: thung ngu thung ngu song nas mthar sna'i rtser sor
NK036(chi)016:288: nang gi 'gro 'ong la sbyar zhing phar gtong ba dang /
NK036(chi)016:289: tshur rngub pa rgyun ring ba gal che'o //
NK036(chi)016:290: de nas lnga pa bum pa'i sbyor ba la bslab pa ni /
NK036(chi)016:291: rlung sngar ltar lan 'ga' sngon du sbyangs pa la /
NK036(chi)016:292: rdo rje de nang du thod pa la thim nas
NK036(chi)016:293: thams cad zhu zhing lte bar yi ge rang bzhin
NK036(chi)016:294: gyis ha gcig gnas pa der gyur par bsams la
NK036(chi)016:295: lto ba rlung gis mer gyis dgang zhing 'og sgo
NK036(chi)016:297: rlung dang lus thams cad na bun ltar bsam zhing /
NK036(chi)016:298: phar gtong tsa na rlung sems nam mkha' dang 'dres
NK036(chi)016:299: pa ltar stong sangs sangs song nas rnam par mi
NK036(chi)016:300: rtog pa dang bsres la bsgom /
NK036(chi)016:301: 'byongs pa'i rtags su lus yod pa mi tshor ba dang /
NK036(chi)016:302: rlung gar drangs pa'i sar 'byung ba dang /
NK036(chi)016:303: zas dang gos yid la mi 'byung ba dang /
NK036(chi)016:305: de dag ni rlung gi rnal 'byor la bslab pa'o //
NK036(chi)016:306: de'i yan lag rnam grangs mang yang las kha tshar du babs so //
NK036(chi)016:307: rlung la bslab pa'i khrid kyi rim pa bstan pa'i dum bu ste gsum pa'o //
NK036(chi)016:308: de ltar rlung la 'byongs nas thig le la bslab pa la gnyis las /
NK036(chi)016:309: chags can yab yum gyi bde ba la bslab pa ni chings bco lngas bstan te /
NK036(chi)016:310: pra khrid nas gsal bas 'dir ma bris so //
NK036(chi)016:311: chags bral rlung sems kyi bde ba rang la bsgom pa ni /
NK036(chi)016:312: lus gnad sngar dang 'dra ba la /
NK036(chi)016:314: rang gi lus stong sang nge bar bsgoms pa'i spyi bo rtse mo rnam par bkod pa ru /
NK036(chi)016:315: thig le stong pa'i sgron ma dkar zhing snum pa sran ma tsam gcig bsams te /
NK036(chi)016:316: rlung bum pa'i sbyor ba sngar ltar byas pa'i thig
NK036(chi)016:317: le sran chung tsam phrom phrom byung nas mgrin par
NK036(chi)016:318: slebs pas lus bde phril gyis song ba la sems
NK036(chi)016:319: bzhag la / de nas snying gar slebs pas de bas bde ba rgyas /
NK036(chi)016:320: de nas lte bar slebs pas de bas kyang bde ba rgyas /
NK036(chi)016:321: gsang bar slebs pas bde ba mchog tu rgyas pa
NK036(chi)016:322: la shes pa bzhag pas lus bde stong du phril
NK036(chi)016:323: gyis 'gro ste / bde ba rgyas shing mi thub pa snyam byed na /
NK036(chi)016:324: yang phar la zlog la thim zhing spyi bor shes pa gtad do //
NK036(chi)016:325: yang lugs gcig la sngar bzhin lte bar ha dmar po de bsgoms la /
NK036(chi)016:326: thig le sran chung tsam babs pa gcig nas gcig tu thim nas ha de la thim /
NK036(chi)016:327: de nas bde phril gyis song ba dang /
NK036(chi)016:328: thig le ha dang bcas pa je chung je phra
NK036(chi)016:329: la stong sangs kyis song nas mi rtog pa la
NK036(chi)016:330: bzhag go // des ni lus thams cad bde stong du 'gro ba dang /
NK036(chi)016:331: rig pa rtse gcig tu gnas pa dang /
NK036(chi)016:332: rlung dang thig le 'byongs pa de rig pa mngon sum nyams su len pa'i tshe /
NK036(chi)016:333: 'byung ba dag pa la tshegs med pa dang /
NK036(chi)016:334: zas dang gos la sred pa gcod pa dang /
NK036(chi)016:335: mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i rig pa la rang dbang thob par byed pa la shin tu gal che'o //
NK036(chi)016:336: mdor bsdus na gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya thams
NK036(chi)016:337: cad la brten nas sems la rang dbang thob par
NK036(chi)016:338: byed pa gal che bar mdo rgyud thams cad du
NK036(chi)016:339: gsungs shing / khyad par du rnam rtog shas che
NK036(chi)016:340: ba la rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po 'dir bsam
NK036(chi)016:341: gtan gyi rim pa dpag tu med pa gsungs so
NK036(chi)016:342: gsungs shing / // las can sngar sbyangs pa can
NK036(chi)016:343: sems la dbang thob pa ni 'di rnams sngon du
NK036(chi)016:344: song zin pas 'dir bshad pa'i rim pa ma byas
NK036(chi)016:346: thig le sbyong ba'i khrid kyi rim pa ste dum bu bzhi pa'o //
NK036(chi)016:347: de nas spros pa gcod pa'i rim pa 'byung ba
NK036(chi)016:348: lnga rang sar dag par byed pa'i gnad ni 'byung
NK036(chi)016:349: bzhi zad pa'i rgyud nam mkha' las /
NK036(chi)016:350: 'khrul gzhi zad pa'i rig pa rgod yan de //
NK036(chi)016:351: sna tshogs khyab brdal chen po'i khang bzangs su //
NK036(chi)016:352: 'dzin byed dran pa zad pa'i lcags kyu yis //
NK036(chi)016:353: gsal byed steng 'og med pa'i snying nas ni //
NK036(chi)016:354: ma yengs bsam pa zad pa'i tshul gyis gzung bar bya'o //
NK036(chi)016:355: zhes 'byung ba a lnga'i don skye med du nyams su len pa ste /
NK036(chi)016:357: thig le 'byongs nas 'byung ba lnga zad par byed pa yin pas /
NK036(chi)016:358: dang po ni lus gnad sngar ltar bya /
NK036(chi)016:359: dmigs pa ni rang gi snying a sngon po tshon gang ba gcig tu bsams te /
NK036(chi)016:360: rlung dang sems kyi 'du byed thams cad a de la bstims la /
NK036(chi)016:361: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa'i don
NK036(chi)016:362: chos thams cad spros pa dang bral ba la mnyam
NK036(chi)016:363: par bzhag cing / rig pa'i ngo bo a'i rang bzhin du nyams su blang /
NK036(chi)016:364: des rnam par mi rtog pa dang thams cad nam mkha' ltar ro //
NK036(chi)016:365: 'di'i dus na yid kyi seng ge ni rnam rtog
NK036(chi)016:366: gi yid yin la yid kyi bu ni yul a
NK036(chi)016:367: la bsdu ba yin pas rtse gcig tu ma yengs
NK036(chi)016:368: par bya'o // nam mkha' dag par byed pa'o //
NK036(chi)016:370: spyi bo'am mdun gyi nam mkha' sna rtse'i thad tsam
NK036(chi)016:371: du +aa ljang nag la shes pa gtad la rlung
NK036(chi)016:372: dang rnam rtog g.yo ba thams cad de la bstims
NK036(chi)016:373: la mi rtog pa bsgom mo //
NK036(chi)016:374: nam mkha'i bu mo ni rlung 'du byed dang bcas pa yin la /
NK036(chi)016:375: nam mkha'i bu ni thabs kyi cha yul du bsgom pa +aa de nyid yin pas bzung ba ste /
NK036(chi)016:376: des ni rlung gi khams rnam par dag par byed pa'o //
NK036(chi)016:378: yang sna rtse'am snying gar +aaa&a&a&a dkar po la sems gtad cing 'du shes dang /
NK036(chi)016:379: rlung thams cad dran pa rang yul du btang nas
NK036(chi)016:380: dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba dgag cing bzhag pa
NK036(chi)016:381: ni / rlung gi zhags pa ni 'du shes kyi yul 'dzin pa la zer la /
NK036(chi)016:382: de 'dzin pa'i a sum brtsegs bsgoms pa ni /
NK036(chi)016:383: lcags kyu yin pas chu rnam par dag par byed pa'o //
NK036(chi)016:385: yang mgrin pa'i nam mkha' la +aa&a&a&a+aa dmar po la rig pa gtad /
NK036(chi)016:386: de 'dzin pa'i yul tshor ba la sogs sdud byed
NK036(chi)016:387: kyi dwangs ma mig gi rnam shes rang dag las
NK036(chi)016:389: me'i mi bo che zhes bya ba /
NK036(chi)016:390: tshor ba yin la me'i gsal shing ni rlung der sdud pa yin pas a bzhi brtsegs bsgoms nas /
NK036(chi)016:391: tshor ba rang rgyud du 'dzin pa me dag par byed pa yin no //
NK036(chi)016:392: lnga pa ni lte ba'am bar snang la yi ge
NK036(chi)016:393: +aa+aa&a&a&aa ser po la shes pa gtad la gzungs yul
NK036(chi)016:394: mched pa thams cad thim zhing /
NK036(chi)016:395: sgo lnga rang rgyud du 'dzin pa dag nas rnam par mi rtog par bzhag la bsgoms pa ni /
NK036(chi)016:396: sa'i grong khyer gyi ni lus sgo lnga dang bcas
NK036(chi)016:397: pa yin la chu ni 'du shes kyi a lnga
NK036(chi)016:398: brtsegs bsgoms pa yin pas lus kyi 'dzin pa 'jig
NK036(chi)016:399: par byed pas / gzhung nas brda' skad du gsungs pa yin no //
NK036(chi)016:400: sa rnam par dag par byed pa'o //
NK036(chi)016:401: 'dir bstan pa'i a lnga la bsgoms pas 'byung ba rang dwangs su 'gro ba yin la /
NK036(chi)016:402: rtsa gnas 'khor lo dang sgra gnad kyi rgyu mtshan gyis /
NK036(chi)016:403: 'khor lo bzhir bsgom zhing der rlung dang sems bsdus te bsgoms pa dang /
NK036(chi)016:404: de yang skye med spros bral du bzhag par bya ba yin par mngon no //
NK036(chi)016:405: skabs 'di yi ram yam kham gsum po ni /
NK036(chi)016:406: rlung me chu'i sa bon yin pas de ltar bsgom dus su 'byung ba 'khrugs nas ma bde na /
NK036(chi)016:407: gnas gsum du bzhag ces pa ni /
NK036(chi)016:408: lus lci zhing bying la 'thibs pa 'byung na me'i 'khor lo yam ljang nag bsams te /
NK036(chi)016:409: rlung dang rnam rtog der bcug la nam mkhar phyur
NK036(chi)016:410: phyur song bar bsgoms nas de ma thag tu shes
NK036(chi)016:412: lus chu shas cher 'khrugs nas grang zhing 'dar na
NK036(chi)016:413: ro rnams 'dus pa'i 'khor lor ram dmar po 'bar
NK036(chi)016:414: ba dang bcas pa bsgoms la rlung drag tu bcug
NK036(chi)016:415: pas / sum mdo'i ha las me byung nas lus
NK036(chi)016:416: thams cad khyab par bsgoms na grang ba sel lo
NK036(chi)016:417: pas / // me'i skyon gyis tsha zhing rtsed pa
NK036(chi)016:418: dang mkhris pa rgyas na snying ga'am pho bar kham
NK036(chi)016:419: dkar zhing bsil ba chu 'khyags ltar bsams nas rlung
NK036(chi)016:420: sid kyi sgras drangs la dbyung /
NK036(chi)016:421: des tshad pa zhi bar 'gyur ro //
NK036(chi)016:422: 'dir ma gsungs kyang rlung gi shes par 'phyos pa dang /
NK036(chi)016:424: snying rlung lta bu byung na lte bar lam gser
NK036(chi)016:425: gyi kha dog can shin tu lci ba bsgoms la
NK036(chi)016:426: 'og sgo drag tu bsdams nas thur la rlung sems
NK036(chi)016:427: gtad na the tshom med par phan pa 'gyur ro
NK036(chi)016:428: // 'dir gegs sel gtso bo brjodrmis pa ni 'byongs
NK036(chi)016:429: pa'i tshad do gzhi bag chags kyi zhen pa gcad
NK036(chi)016:430: pa ni yod pa ched du mi spang med pa
NK036(chi)016:431: ched du mi btsal yod pa la mngon par mi
NK036(chi)016:432: zhen de yang 'das pa'i rjes mi gcod ma 'ongs
NK036(chi)016:433: pa'i sngon mi bsu da ltar gyi bag chags gnyen
NK036(chi)016:434: po dang bcas pa thams cad rgyud la mi brten
NK036(chi)016:435: pas snang ba snang bar grol bas dngos po 'dzin
NK036(chi)016:436: pa rang sar dag de yang snang ba nyid snang
NK036(chi)016:437: thog tu grol bar byed pa byi'u khras khyer ba
NK036(chi)016:438: lta bu'o 'gyu ba 'gyu thog tu grol ba bar
NK036(chi)016:439: snang gi ser bu lta bu'o snang shes gnyis med
NK036(chi)016:440: du thim pa chu la chu thim pa lta bu'o
NK036(chi)016:441: des ni bag chags 'khrul pa'i yul las 'das pa
NK036(chi)016:442: bdag tu lta ba'i zhen pa chod pa'o bde bar
NK036(chi)016:443: gshegs pa'i dgongs pa ni thun mtshams las 'das pas
NK036(chi)016:444: nyin mtshan dang mnyam rjes med pa'o lha dang mi'i
NK036(chi)016:445: sems 'dzin bsgom pa ni snying gzer nas nyer gcig
NK036(chi)016:446: bstan kyang 'dir bdun bsgom ste de yang brtson 'grus
NK036(chi)016:447: dang ldan pa'i gang zag gis sngon du bla ma
NK036(chi)016:448: mnyes pa la sogs pa'i sgo nas tshogs bsags la
NK036(chi)016:449: de nas dgongs pa yid la mthun par stan bde
NK036(chi)016:450: ba la skyil krung du 'dug ste mtshan ma a
NK036(chi)016:451: dkar la sems gtad pa ni rang gi sna yi
NK036(chi)016:452: rtse mo la yi ge a dkar po gcig bsgom
NK036(chi)016:453: rlung phar 'gro ba'i dus a de rgyangs kyis song
NK036(chi)016:454: ba la gnas par bya'o nang du bsdus pa'i dus
NK036(chi)016:455: na a dkar hril gyi sna yi rtse mo la
NK036(chi)016:456: gnas pa la sems gtad de yang bdag gis lus
NK036(chi)016:457: la tshad pa'i nad yod na grang reg dang ldan
NK036(chi)016:458: par bsgom grang ba'i nad yod na tsha reg dang
NK036(chi)016:459: ldan par bsgom de ltar thun chung zhing grangs mang
NK036(chi)016:460: ba la bslab de nas nyin mtshan phyed mar bsgoms
NK036(chi)016:461: pas skye med bsam ngo dang bral bas nyams su
NK036(chi)016:462: myong ba mi skye mi srid do bar gcod sel
NK036(chi)016:463: ba'i yi ge phata drag po la sems gzung ba
NK036(chi)016:464: ni lus sems gong ltar so so glod la shes
NK036(chi)016:465: pa dar cig rang sar bzhag la de nas rab
NK036(chi)016:466: tu drag pos phata barjoda pas de nyid las shes
NK036(chi)016:467: pa had pa zhig 'ong ste de'i dus na ye
NK036(chi)016:468: shes ngos gzung zhing yang nas yang du phata kyis
NK036(chi)016:469: shes pa gsal gdab par bya'o de nyin mtshan phyed
NK036(chi)016:470: mar nyams su blangs pas rang bzhin yongs su dag
NK036(chi)016:471: pa'i nyams su myong ba mi 'char mi srid do
NK036(chi)016:472: de la ma mos na khro bo 'gyed pa'i gad
NK036(chi)016:473: mo la sems gzung ba ni yang lus la sogs
NK036(chi)016:474: pa gong ltar byas la ngag tu ha ha zhes
NK036(chi)016:475: drag la thung bar barjoda shes pa ha la gtad
NK036(chi)016:476: rnam rtog la sogs pa sems la mi bde ba
NK036(chi)016:477: gang byung yang ngag tu ha drag tu barjoda cing
NK036(chi)016:478: ngag dang shes pa rlung gsum bsre ba ni gnad
NK036(chi)016:479: do de ltar dus thams cad du bsgom pas chos
NK036(chi)016:480: nyid dag pa ngos gzung dang bral ba'i nyams skye
NK036(chi)016:481: ba la the tshom med do de ltar ngag la
NK036(chi)016:482: brten pa'i dus na shes pa sna mi bskyil mi
NK036(chi)016:483: lteb cing ngag gis barjoda pa ma nyams par gal
NK036(chi)016:484: che gsungs so yang de la ma mos na lha
NK036(chi)016:485: ma yin rtsod pa 'gyed pa la sems gzung ba
NK036(chi)016:486: ni yang lus la sogs pa gong ltar byas la
NK036(chi)016:487: ri mthon po'i brag gi steng la sogs par 'dug
NK036(chi)016:488: la mgo dang lus po dal gyis bsgril lus kyang
NK036(chi)016:489: dang po bskyod dal gyis bsgril lus kyang nyi ma
NK036(chi)016:490: gsum bzhi tsam du bya'o de nas drag tu bsgril
NK036(chi)016:491: de nas khams kyis thub thang du bsgril lo de
NK036(chi)016:492: ltar bsgul bskyod phyag rgya las ma 'das par byas
NK036(chi)016:493: la phyi'i snang ba 'gags nas ci'i ngo bor yang
NK036(chi)016:494: grub pa med pa 'byung ngo de la mthong snang
NK036(chi)016:495: rang grol ba'i nyams su myong ba mi skye mi
NK036(chi)016:496: srid do de'i dus su rlung la shis pa'i kha
NK036(chi)016:497: zas brten par bya'o lte bar yi ge ram la
NK036(chi)016:498: sems gtad pa ni gnad do de la ma mos
NK036(chi)016:499: na rnam par rtog pa h'u gis ded pa de
NK036(chi)016:500: la sems gzung ba ni ngag tu h'u zhes rab
NK036(chi)016:501: tu ring bar dbyangs dang ldan par barjoda do rlung
NK036(chi)016:502: dang bsre ba ni gnad do de yang h'u zhes
NK036(chi)016:503: skabs su thung bar yang barjoda do de ltar mi
NK036(chi)016:504: dal bar yun ring bar byas na rnam par rtog
NK036(chi)016:505: pa chos nyid la 'char ba'i nyams su myong ba
NK036(chi)016:506: mi skye mi srid do de la ma mos na
NK036(chi)016:507: stong pa nyid rim gyis pa la sems gzung ba
NK036(chi)016:508: ni yang lus gnad la sogs gong ltar byas la
NK036(chi)016:509: dang po lus kyi bye brag mang por bsil la
NK036(chi)016:510: ming du ma la sogs par gzhig ste ming don
NK036(chi)016:511: so sor btags pas lus dngos por grub pa med
NK036(chi)016:512: par shes par bya'o de nas phyi rol gyi snang
NK036(chi)016:513: ba thams cad la de ltar ming don du btsal
NK036(chi)016:514: zhing ba tags pas gang du yang grub pa mi
NK036(chi)016:515: rnyed de de ltar ming gis btags pa thams cad
NK036(chi)016:516: stong par go ba dang dngos po yang stong par
NK036(chi)016:517: 'gyur ba'o de nas rim gyis chos nyid stong pa
NK036(chi)016:518: nyid du mi 'gro mi srid do yang de la
NK036(chi)016:519: ma mos na snang ba'i gzugs gang 'dug pa la
NK036(chi)016:520: shes pa bcug cing de nyid skad cig gis stong
NK036(chi)016:521: sang sang la blo gnas par byas la dus de
NK036(chi)016:522: tsam na gang la bltas bltas stong par khrol gyis
NK036(chi)016:523: 'gro ba 'byung ngo de ltar yun du bsgoms pas
NK036(chi)016:524: snang ba thams ca da me long la has btab
NK036(chi)016:525: pa ltar stong had kyi mi 'gro mi srid do
NK036(chi)016:526: de yang dang po snang gnyis pa stong gsum pa
NK036(chi)016:527: dngos po gang la yang ma grub pa'o de lta
NK036(chi)016:528: bu bsgom de la ming du btags na nyin mtshan
NK036(chi)016:529: kha sbyor gyi sgom pa zhes bya ste nyin mo
NK036(chi)016:530: 'das pa'i cha mtshan mo 'khor ba'i cha yin pas
NK036(chi)016:531: 'di'i dus su 'khor 'das kha sbyar bas yul dngos
NK036(chi)016:532: po gang du yang ma grub pa'i chos nyid ces
NK036(chi)016:533: bya ste de tsa na nyin mo sgom gsal rgyu
NK036(chi)016:534: med mtshan mo mi gsal ba'i rgyu med par sbrel
NK036(chi)016:535: song ba la bya'o de'i man ngag tu rgya mtsho'i
NK036(chi)016:536: cog bzhag ni mig chu'i rang bzhin yin pas rgya
NK036(chi)016:537: mtsho zhes bya ste gang bsgoms kyang mig rang sor
NK036(chi)016:538: cog gis 'jog pa gnad yin no mi bsgoms na
NK036(chi)016:539: mi sgom sgom zhig byed phan chad mig mi 'dzum
NK036(chi)016:540: pa gnad yin no de ltar byas pas dper na
NK036(chi)016:541: rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du gza' dang rgyu skar
NK036(chi)016:542: la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan thams cad bkra sal ler
NK036(chi)016:543: snang yang rgya mtsho la gos pa med cing snang
NK036(chi)016:544: yul du yod la gzung yul du grub pa med
NK036(chi)016:545: par snang ba ltar 'di ltar bsgoms pa'i dus na
NK036(chi)016:546: phyi'i snang ba nyams snang ngor shar la bden ngor
NK036(chi)016:547: ma grub pas shes pa phyir snang thog tu ma
NK036(chi)016:548: shor snang ba shes pas gang du yang ma bcad
NK036(chi)016:549: par rang sar 'dug pa la sgom pa zhes bya'o
NK036(chi)016:550: gal te bsgoms pa'i dus su tshogs drug 'gags nas
NK036(chi)016:551: dran med du song na zhi gnas phyogs gcig lhung
NK036(chi)016:552: ba zhes bya ste sgom pa'i gol sar 'dug pa'o
NK036(chi)016:553: de ltar shes pa la snang bas ma gos /
NK036(chi)016:554: snang ba la shes pas ma dpyad par rang sa
NK036(chi)016:555: la gsal ba'o des dgongs pa snang srid gzhir bzhag
NK036(chi)016:556: la gnas pa zhes bya ste de gong du gzhir
NK036(chi)016:557: bzhegs zhes tshig mtha' la rtog barjoda skyes pa de
NK036(chi)016:558: 'dir tshig gi spros pa chod pa de tshogs thams
NK036(chi)016:559: cad gzhi la bzhag nas rang sar grol ba ni
NK036(chi)016:560: snang zhing srid pa'i chos dang ming dang yi ge'i
NK036(chi)016:561: tshogs su shar ba rnams rang sar bzhag pas tshig
NK036(chi)016:562: la mi gnas par rang sar grol ba la gzhi
NK036(chi)016:563: dngos po'i gnas lugs la bzhag pa zhes bya'o de'i
NK036(chi)016:564: dus na nyon mongs pa nyid rgyas gdab pas de'i
NK036(chi)016:565: snying po ye shes su shar te dper na 'jim
NK036(chi)016:566: pa la brkos phor btabs pas tsh+wa tsh+war krong gis
NK036(chi)016:567: 'ongs pa dang 'dra bar snang btags kyi chos sna
NK036(chi)016:568: tshogs pa chos skur krong gis 'char bar nges so
NK036(chi)016:569: de'i dus na gang zag de la ming du btags
NK036(chi)016:570: nas chos la gnas pa'i dus zhes bya'o 'khor 'das
NK036(chi)016:571: kyi chos thams cad rang gis blo thog na gnas
NK036(chi)016:572: pas de nyid ma phye mi 'byed rang sar gnas
NK036(chi)016:573: pa la sgom pa zhes bya'o 'di dag ni nyi
NK036(chi)016:574: zla kha sbyor gyi rgyud nas bshad pa'o lta ba
NK036(chi)016:575: la rgyun du byed pa'i rnal 'byor ni de la
NK036(chi)016:576: spyi'i lta ba dang rang gi lta ba gnyis so
NK036(chi)016:577: spyi'i lta ba ni theg pa rim pa dgu so
NK036(chi)016:578: sor 'dod lugs mi 'dra ba rnams so 'di dag
NK036(chi)016:579: ni tshig gi lta ba yid dpyod 'dzin pa yin
NK036(chi)016:580: no rang gi lta ba rdzoogs pa chen po bya
NK036(chi)016:581: bral lhun grub kyi lta ba ste phyi'i chos can
NK036(chi)016:582: la bltas pas rang bzhin med par mthong nang chos
NK036(chi)016:583: nyid la bltas pas skye ba med par mthong gsang
NK036(chi)016:584: ba rang rig la bltas pas rig pa mngon sum
NK036(chi)016:585: du mthong ba'o de yang mthong lugs ji ltar mthong
NK036(chi)016:586: na chos can dum bu ba la rdo rje'i mig
NK036(chi)016:587: gis bltas pas mthong lugs chos can gyi snang ba
NK036(chi)016:588: sgyu ma'am mdang sum rmis pa'i rmi lam ltar mthong
NK036(chi)016:589: bas 'khrul pa yang dag tu grub pa med par
NK036(chi)016:590: rtogs te da khams gsum du bzlog pa med pas
NK036(chi)016:591: blo bade'o chos can bye brag la shes rab kyi
NK036(chi)016:592: mig gis bltas pas kun rdzob kyi don rnam par
NK036(chi)016:593: snang la rang bzhin med par sgyu ma lta bur
NK036(chi)016:594: mthong bas chos nyid la ngos bzung med par rtogs
NK036(chi)016:595: pas rig pa las dang bag chags kyi rten med
NK036(chi)016:596: pas blo bade'o nang chos nyid la ye shes kyi
NK036(chi)016:597: mig gis bltas pas rig mnyam tha dad med par
NK036(chi)016:598: mthong bas chos nyid rang la yang bden pa rang
NK036(chi)016:599: rgyud du 'dzin pa med de spros bral rnam dag
NK036(chi)016:600: tu rtogs pas chos nyid rang bzhin med par shes
NK036(chi)016:601: pa ste rang gis grub mtha' zhig nas chos zad
NK036(chi)016:602: pas da chos su 'dzin pa'i zhen pa dang bral
NK036(chi)016:603: nas blo bde ba'o gsang ba rang rig la chos
NK036(chi)016:604: nyid rnam par dag pa'i mig gis gcer bzhag tu
NK036(chi)016:605: bltas pas mthong lugs rang gi rig pa nyid dbyangs
NK036(chi)016:606: dang rig pa 'du 'bral med par mngon su ma
NK036(chi)016:607: du mthong bas yid dpyod tshig gis sangs mi rgya
NK036(chi)016:608: bar rtogs te yid dpyod tshig la gdeng du mi
NK036(chi)016:609: 'dzin pas blo bde ba ni chos nyid dbang po'i
NK036(chi)016:610: spyod yul du mthong ba'i gnad kyis so de dag
NK036(chi)016:611: rnams la ming du btags na grong khyer rgyun gcod
NK036(chi)016:612: kyi lta ba zhes bya ste mngal gyi grong khyer
NK036(chi)016:613: rgyun gcod nas khams gsum du mi ldog pa'i lta
NK036(chi)016:614: bas te de nas brtson 'grus can rab tshe 'di
NK036(chi)016:615: nyid la zag bcas mi snang bar sangs rgya 'bring
NK036(chi)016:616: gis bla ma'i gdams ngag yod pas dum re nyams
NK036(chi)016:617: su blangs kyang thang chad nas nyams su blang longs
NK036(chi)016:618: ma byung ba ni chos nyid bar do la rang
NK036(chi)016:619: gi chos nyid stobs su gyur nas sangs rgya tha
NK036(chi)016:620: mas rgyu'i gdams ngag ni zhus 'di la le los
NK036(chi)016:621: nyams su blang longs ma byung ba ni chos nyid
NK036(chi)016:622: bden pa'i byin rlabs la brten nas rang bzhin sprul
NK036(chi)016:623: pa sku'i zhing khams su dbugs phyung ste bardzusa te
NK036(chi)016:624: skyes nas de nyid la sangs rgya bar nges pas
NK036(chi)016:625: grong khyer rgyun gcod ces bya'o de'i man ngag ri
NK036(chi)016:626: bo cog bzhag gi lta ba ste dper na dbus
NK036(chi)016:627: kyi ri bo mchog rab kyi steng du phyin na
NK036(chi)016:628: gling bzhi dus gcig la mthong ba ltar rdzogs pa
NK036(chi)016:629: chen po'i steng nas bltas pas theg pa rim pa
NK036(chi)016:630: dgu'i 'dod pa rang lugs rtogs pa'o theg pa gzhan
NK036(chi)016:631: gyis ni rdzogs pa chen po'i 'dod pa mi mthong
NK036(chi)016:632: ngo de nyid mi 'gyur ba'i ngos nas kyang ri
NK036(chi)016:633: bo cog bzhag go de la dgongs pa ni khams
NK036(chi)016:634: gsum yongs su grol ba'i dgongs pa ste de ltar
NK036(chi)016:635: rdzogs chen rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas bltas na ma
NK036(chi)016:636: grol pa gcig kyang med do de ltar rtogs pa'i
NK036(chi)016:637: tshe na 'gro drug rang sar grol pa zhes bya'o
NK036(chi)016:638: de'i tshe nyon mongs pa gnas su dag ste mkha'
NK036(chi)016:639: la sprin dengs pa'i rnam pa'am chu'i rnyogs ma dwangs
NK036(chi)016:640: pa lta bur rang sar dengs pa ni dang po
NK036(chi)016:641: 'khrul ma myong da lta'i 'khrul pa la mi gnas
NK036(chi)016:642: tha ma 'khrul mi srid pa'i gnad las byung ba'o
NK036(chi)016:643: de'i dus na chos bor ba'i gang zag ces ming
NK036(chi)016:644: du btags pa ni yongs la byed pa'i chos med
NK036(chi)016:645: pa'o 'bras bu lam du byed pa ni don gyi
NK036(chi)016:646: 'bras bu rgyun mi ldog pa bse shing gi 'bras
NK036(chi)016:647: bu lta bu'o de yang 'di dus na rgyal pos
NK036(chi)016:648: gnad sa zin te mi 'gyur ba ni dper na
NK036(chi)016:649: rgyal rigs kyi phru gu spyi bo nas dbang bskur
NK036(chi)016:650: nas rgyal sa zin te mi 'gyur ba bzhin rig
NK036(chi)016:651: pa nyid rang sa zin pa'o 'bangs cham la 'bebs
NK036(chi)016:652: te mi 'gyur ba ni rgyal po gcig gis 'bangs
NK036(chi)016:653: cham la phab pa de rgyal srid du gnas pa
NK036(chi)016:654: bzhin du sgo lnga'i rnam shes 'char ba'i gzhi stong
NK036(chi)016:655: pas 'khor ba'i mig med pa'o blon po btson du
NK036(chi)016:656: bzung ste mi 'gyur ba ni dper na rgyal po'i
NK036(chi)016:657: bka' blon btson du bzung na rgyal po yang nyen
NK036(chi)016:658: pa bzhin yid kyi rnam par rtog pa 'gyu ba
NK036(chi)016:659: chad pas rig pa rang dbang thob pa'o 'bras bu
NK036(chi)016:660: de la ming du btags na rang bzhin rnam dag
NK036(chi)016:661: gi 'bras bu zhes bya'o byas pa'i rtsol ba las
NK036(chi)016:662: byung ba ma yin te ye nas dag pa'i don
NK036(chi)016:663: rgyud la skyes pas 'bras bu zhes tha snyad du
NK036(chi)016:664: bya'o de'i man ngag ni rig pa cog bzhag gis
NK036(chi)016:665: de ltar 'bras bu de gang las byung na rig
NK036(chi)016:666: pa nyid gang snang gang shar gyi steng du bzhag
NK036(chi)016:667: pa las byung ba'o de'i dgongs pa ni srid gsum
NK036(chi)016:668: ka dag ces bya ba rang gi lus ngag yid
NK036(chi)016:669: gsum la las dang bag chags dang rtog pa gang
NK036(chi)016:670: yang mi gnas pas srid gsum ka dag go 'di'i
NK036(chi)016:671: dus na nyon mongs pa ni rang grol du song
NK036(chi)016:672: ste dper na sbrul gyi mdud pa nyid bya long
NK036(chi)016:673: med par grol ba dang 'dra'o de bzhin du nyon
NK036(chi)016:674: mongs pa skye long med par chos nyid du rang
NK036(chi)016:675: grol ba'o de'i dus na gang zag de chos las
NK036(chi)016:676: 'das pa zhes bya'o 'khor 'das gang du 'dzin pa'i
NK036(chi)016:677: shes pa dang bral ba'o de dag gis ni dmigs
NK036(chi)016:678: pa'i yul can gyi blo can rnams kyis nyams su
NK036(chi)016:679: blang bya ste don gyi spros pa la dga' ba
NK036(chi)016:680: rnams kyi don du'o da ni rig pa rang snang
NK036(chi)016:681: gi blo can rnams kyis nyams su blang ba ston
NK036(chi)016:682: te de la gnyis khregs chod dang thod rgal lo
NK036(chi)016:683: khregs chod ni snang ba dang ma 'brel ba 'di
NK036(chi)016:684: nyid la rtogs pa mngon sum du skad cig gis
NK036(chi)016:685: gyur ba'i thod rgal nyams su blang ba ni sngon
NK036(chi)016:686: du dbang bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byas la de
NK036(chi)016:687: nas gong gis bsgrub lugs gnyis po gang yang rung
NK036(chi)016:688: bas man ngag la sngon 'gro dngos gzhi gnyis dang
NK036(chi)016:689: po 'khor 'das ru shan dbye ba'i spyod pa gsum
NK036(chi)016:690: bya ba ni dang po lus ru shan dbye ba'i
NK036(chi)016:691: spyod pa bya de'i rtags tshad la phebs na ngag
NK036(chi)016:692: ru shan dbye ba'i spyod pa bya de'i rtags tshad
NK036(chi)016:693: la phebs nas sems ru shan dbye ba'i spyod pa
NK036(chi)016:694: bya'o de dag la mchog gi dgos pa dang thun
NK036(chi)016:695: mong gi dgos pa gnyis gnyis te drug go de
NK036(chi)016:696: nas rnal du dbab pa gsum bya ste lus rnal
NK036(chi)016:697: du phebs pas phung po khams dang skye mched dang
NK036(chi)016:698: byang sems rgyas pa'i dgos pa yod do de nas
NK036(chi)016:699: ngag rnal du phebs pas brjod ba'i lus ngag las
NK036(chi)016:700: log pa'i skyes bu dam pa rnams ni spyod pa
NK036(chi)016:701: ma byas kyang chog pa nyid do //
NK036(chi)016:702: ru shan 'byed pa bstan pa 'i dum bu ste bdun pa'o //
NK036(chi)016:703: de nas shin tu spros med kyi dbang sbyin par bya bar bshad do //
NK036(chi)016:704: de nas rnal du 'abebasapa pa yi //
NK036(chi)016:705: cho ga mkhas pas zhag gsum bya //
NK036(chi)016:706: gal te sngon du ma sbyangs na //
NK036(chi)016:707: de nas sems kyi sna khrid pa'i //
NK036(chi)016:708: sngon 'gro rnams la sbyang bar bya'o //
NK036(chi)016:709: zhes gsungs pas sngar ma bstan na skabs 'dir thams cad sems nyid yin pa dang /
NK036(chi)016:710: de yang spros bral chen por rtogs par bya ba'i phyir sems sbyang bar bya'o //
NK036(chi)016:711: de nas shin tu spros med kyi dbang gis stong
NK036(chi)016:712: pa nyid kyi dkyil 'khor du bcug la dbang sbyin
NK036(chi)016:714: de nas lus gnad gzir bar bya ste /
NK036(chi)016:715: dang po glang po che'i 'dug stangs la gzhi bca' ba gces te /
NK036(chi)016:716: de la glang po che lta bu ni kha sbub
NK036(chi)016:717: tu nyal la lag pa gnyis gru mo sa la
NK036(chi)016:718: btsugs te / lkog ma lag mthil gyis btegs la pus mo brang la sbyar te /
NK036(chi)016:719: mjing pa bteg yid tsam phyir dgye bar byas la /
NK036(chi)016:720: lta stangs ni mig gyen la har por ma 'gul bar lta'o //
NK036(chi)016:721: drang srong gi 'dug stangs kyis gnad ma gzir na lus mi chun pas /
NK036(chi)016:722: drang srong lta bu ni lus tsog pur 'dug ste /
NK036(chi)016:723: rkang pa'i long bu gnyis gshibs /
NK036(chi)016:724: pus mo gsus pa la sbyar /
NK036(chi)016:725: gsus pa yang sgal pa la yid tsam sbyar /
NK036(chi)016:726: lag pa gnyis kyi gru mo pus mo'i steng du btsugs la /
NK036(chi)016:727: mgo pus mo'i steng du dun ne byas la /
NK036(chi)016:728: lag pa'i mthil gnyis kyis 'gram pa'i zur nas mi 'gyur bar btegs la /
NK036(chi)016:729: lta stangs mig gnyis mi 'gul bar har por rang gi smin mtshams su thad kar lta'o //
NK036(chi)016:730: seng ge'i 'dug stangs la rtsal ma sbyangs na rig pa mi chun pas seng ge lta bu ni /
NK036(chi)016:731: tsog pu'i pus mo gnyis sa la btsugs la yid tsam phyir bsgrad /
NK036(chi)016:732: lag pa gnyis pus mo'i phyi logs su sa la btsugs te /
NK036(chi)016:733: yid tsam phyir bsgrad la lus kyi ljid cung zad por /
NK036(chi)016:734: 'phongs yid tsam phyir phyung la rgal tshigs drang por
NK036(chi)016:735: bsrang la mjing pa rgyab tu dgye bar byas te
NK036(chi)016:736: / lta stangs mig yid tsam mdun du bltas la sor bzhi par gtad do //
NK036(chi)016:737: de dag dus su lus ma 'gul ba dang /
NK036(chi)016:738: dbugs phar 'gro tshur 'ong shin tu dal bar bya'o //
NK036(chi)016:739: de rnams ni lus kyi 'dug stangs gsum la sbyang ba dang /
NK036(chi)016:740: mig lta stangs gsum du gtad pa dang /
NK036(chi)016:741: mi 'gul ba gsum gyis gzer gdab pa zhes bya'o //
NK036(chi)016:742: de la skyon de rnams ma yin pa bya rgod kyi spungs stangs dang /
NK036(chi)016:744: gzhan yang gang bde bar bya'o //
NK036(chi)016:746: seng ge glang chen ri bong dang //
NK036(chi)016:747: mda' srong lta bu'i lta stangs bzhi //
NK036(chi)016:748: zhes dung yig can du gsungs so //
NK036(chi)016:749: mdor bsdus na rnam par mi rtog par lta stangs bya ba gal che'o //
NK036(chi)016:750: de ltar nyi ma mang du sbyangs na /
NK036(chi)016:751: ngo sprod mi dgos par mngon sum du rtogs pa'ang srid do //
NK036(chi)016:752: lus gnad dang lta stangs bstan pa ste dum bu brgyad pa'o //
NK036(chi)016:753: de nas tshig gsum gyis skye ba med pa'i don
NK036(chi)016:754: mthong bar byed pa'i thabs ngo sprad par bya ste
NK036(chi)016:755: / nam mkha' sprin dang bral ba'i tshe shin tu
NK036(chi)016:756: dben par song la rig pa mig la gcun la
NK036(chi)016:757: nyi ma'i rgyun phyogs su gong gi lta stangs kyis
NK036(chi)016:758: bltas pas nam mkha' la rig pa rang gi ngo
NK036(chi)016:759: bo rdo rje lu gu rgyud ces bya ba /
NK036(chi)016:760: phra ba rta rnga la mdud pa sgrigs pa lta bu /
NK036(chi)016:761: bar bar na thig le yungs 'bru tsam kha dog gsal ba /
NK036(chi)016:762: de la yun ring du bltas pas nam mkha' gang ba tsam gyi thig le rkyang pa dang /
NK036(chi)016:763: gnyis sbrel la sogs pa dpag tu med par 'char ro //
NK036(chi)016:764: de ni chos sku dang thig le nyag gcig ces bya ste /
NK036(chi)016:765: sku gsung thugs thug sprad kyi man ngag ces bya'o //
NK036(chi)016:766: sangs rgyas dang zhal mngon sum du mjal ba ces bya'o //
NK036(chi)016:767: rig pa de yang lta ba mig dang 'brel ba'i
NK036(chi)016:768: gnas kyis mig gar 'gul ba'i phyogs su 'gro zhing
NK036(chi)016:770: thig le phra mo de dag kyang 'gro 'ong dang bcas pa'o //
NK036(chi)016:771: de nyid bzung ba'i man ngag ni mig gyen la yid tsam bzlog pa gces te /
NK036(chi)016:772: smin mtshams su dbyings rnam par dag pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba /
NK036(chi)016:773: mthing kha khyab pa chen po'i 'od /
NK036(chi)016:774: dbyibs yi ge'i na ro lta bu /
NK036(chi)016:775: kha dog 'ja' tshon lta bur 'char te /
NK036(chi)016:776: de ni mig dang sha'i mdangs 'phrad pa la brten nas 'char ba ste /
NK036(chi)016:777: rig pa der gtad nas lta ba ni 'dzin par
NK036(chi)016:778: byed pa'i lcags kyu zhes bya ste mchog tu gces
NK036(chi)016:779: pa'o // de ni lus 'di ltar gyis la /
NK036(chi)016:780: yul nam mkha' la rig pa 'di ltos zhes bya ba tshig gsum gyis ngo sprad pa yin no //
NK036(chi)016:781: de rnams dang por ngo sprad pas rig pa mngon sum zhes bya ba /
NK036(chi)016:782: lhag mthong gi rig pa zhes par bstan to //
NK036(chi)016:783: da ni de mthong bas rgyu mtshan go bar byed pa gal che ste /
NK036(chi)016:784: 'di nyid kyi rig pa'i rgyab brten nas kyang gsungs la /
NK036(chi)016:785: dung yig can dang gzhan yang rgyud 'grel thams cad
NK036(chi)016:786: nas mang du gsungs kyang 'dir gal che ba cung
NK036(chi)016:787: zad gcig bstan par bya ste /
NK036(chi)016:788: de la dbyings rig 'char ba'i rgyu rkyen /
NK036(chi)016:790: de nyams len du 'gro ba'i rgyu mtshan 'bras bur bstan pa'o //
NK036(chi)016:791: dang po ni rgyu rnam pa gnyis te /
NK036(chi)016:792: rig pa'i dbye ba lnga'i nang nas /
NK036(chi)016:793: gzhir gnas kyi ngo bo rig pa /
NK036(chi)016:794: ngo bo ka dag gi gnas lugs ye shes gsum ldan /
NK036(chi)016:795: ngo bor rang bzhin thugs rje gsum stong pa dang
NK036(chi)016:796: gsal ba dang 'gag pa med pa'i gnas su bzhugs
NK036(chi)016:797: pa la / gzhan nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po zhes bshad do //
NK036(chi)016:798: de nyid la gnyis 'dzin gyi rtog pa med kyang /
NK036(chi)016:801: rgya mtsho rba rlabs ltar 'gyu ba 'gag pa med
NK036(chi)016:802: par g.yo ba las ye shes kyi cha gsal snang
NK036(chi)016:803: gi rnam par 'byung ba la sems pa yid drug
NK036(chi)016:804: tu 'gyur te / ngo bo mi rtog pa yin kyang /
NK036(chi)016:805: gnyis su snang ba la rtog cing dpyod pa'i shes pa skyes te /
NK036(chi)016:806: de ni chos spyi'i skad la ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed /
NK036(chi)016:807: de'i rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa zhes bya /
NK036(chi)016:809: 'khrul pa'i ye shes spag spog de //
NK036(chi)016:810: thog ma ka dag 'khrul med las //
NK036(chi)016:811: nges pa med pa'i lhun grub la //
NK036(chi)016:812: sna tshogs du mar shar tshul la //
NK036(chi)016:813: 'gag pa med pa'i rol pa ni //
NK036(chi)016:814: cir yang mdzad cing cir yang 'char //
NK036(chi)016:815: nges med snang ba du ma'o //
NK036(chi)016:816: de nyid gzu bo'i bla can la //
NK036(chi)016:817: mthong ba ma 'gags nang gsal te //
NK036(chi)016:818: de la nges pa'i char gzung ngo //
NK036(chi)016:819: zhes tshig bzhis rgyu mtshan bstan nas /
NK036(chi)016:820: de ltar gnas pa'i gzhi de la //
NK036(chi)016:821: rgyu dang 'khrul pa'i sa bon ni //
NK036(chi)016:822: gsal ba'i cha na phyir shol bas //
NK036(chi)016:823: shes pa gsal gsal rig rig de //
NK036(chi)016:824: ma rig pa ni gsum dag las //
NK036(chi)016:825: yid tsam phyir 'gyus snang cha la //
NK036(chi)016:826: yul de bdag tu bzung ba'i blos //
NK036(chi)016:828: de la ma rig pa gsum ni /
NK036(chi)016:829: lhan cig skyes pa'i ma rig pa ni yongs grub
NK036(chi)016:830: ka nas dag pa la dag par ma shes pa
NK036(chi)016:831: yin la / gzhan dbang 'gyu byed snang ba'i 'od
NK036(chi)016:832: dang bcas pa la snang stong gnyis dbyer med du
NK036(chi)016:833: ma shes pa ni 'du byed rkyen gyi ma rig
NK036(chi)016:834: yin la / pa zhes bya / yul yul can
NK036(chi)016:835: gnyis tha dad du phyi rol don dang de la
NK036(chi)016:836: brdar btags pa'i ming dang don gyi bag chags bden
NK036(chi)016:837: med du ma shes pas blang dor byas te /
NK036(chi)016:838: sred len srid pa'i rgyur gyur pa ni /
NK036(chi)016:839: kun brtags 'khrul pa'i ma rig pa zhes bya'o //
NK036(chi)016:840: de ltar rgyud dang po ye shes ma rig pa dang 'dres pa las /
NK036(chi)016:841: gnyis pa da lta bye brag tu dbyings rig mig tu gsal ba'i rgyu ni /
NK036(chi)016:842: rkyen 'dus pa'i tshul go bar byas pas mngon du shes par 'gyur te /
NK036(chi)016:843: sngar gyi lus snang gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya
NK036(chi)016:844: chos 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas rnam par drug
NK036(chi)016:845: la der 'dzin gyi yid shes kyi bar drug gis
NK036(chi)016:846: bar du dbang po dang sbyor zhing de rnams byed
NK036(chi)016:848: rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pas khams bco brgyad du 'gyur te /
NK036(chi)016:849: gzhi 'dzin pa'i rig pa zhes bya ba chos spyi'i skad du /
NK036(chi)016:850: kun gzhi sems phung po khams dang skye mched kyis
NK036(chi)016:851: bag chags thams cad bgos pas sa bon thams cad
NK036(chi)016:853: de rgyu rkyen du gyur la /
NK036(chi)016:854: bdag po'i rkye na 'dzin pa'i rnam shes drug gis byas nas /
NK036(chi)016:855: dmigs pa'i rkyen yul drug gis byas te /
NK036(chi)016:856: de ma thag pa'i rkyen yid de ma thag pa
NK036(chi)016:857: gong ma gsum tshogs pa'i skad cig des byas pas
NK036(chi)016:858: / rkyen bzhi don ltar snang ba bar ma chad
NK036(chi)016:859: pas 'dod pa blang bya dang mi 'dod pa dor
NK036(chi)016:860: / bya dang / bar ma btang snyoms dug gsum du song ste /
NK036(chi)016:861: de'i rtog pa dang snang ba bltas pas phyi 'jig
NK036(chi)016:862: rten dang nang lus kyi rnam pa khams gsum gang
NK036(chi)016:863: rung gi sred len gyi dbang gis srid par grub
NK036(chi)016:876: gzhi dang gzhi yi snang cha las //
NK036(chi)016:877: gzhi dang gzhi zhes khyad par las //
NK036(chi)016:879: rkyen bzhi dmigs pa ma dag pas //
NK036(chi)016:880: nyon mongs drug gis bdag tu bcings //
NK036(chi)016:881: yul drug so so'i rnam pa shar //
NK036(chi)016:882: der ltas yul la bdag bzung ba'o //
NK036(chi)016:883: de nas rim gyis snod bcud kyi //
NK036(chi)016:884: snang ba du ma'i gzugs bsdus pa'o //
NK036(chi)016:885: 'di nyid mi shes byis pa rnams //
NK036(chi)016:886: zo chu bzhin du brgyud mar gnas //
NK036(chi)016:887: so so'i yul dang tshad len pa'o //
NK036(chi)016:889: de ltar ma rig pas lus su grub kyang 'dzin
NK036(chi)016:890: pa'i rnam shes de ni mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i rig
NK036(chi)016:892: chos spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
NK036(chi)016:893: ye shes kyi snang cha yul du snang ba de ni /
NK036(chi)016:894: gzhan dag tu rnam par mi gsal la /
NK036(chi)016:895: mig tu gzugs kyi rnam pa snang la rang bzhin
NK036(chi)016:896: med par rang dag thig le'i snying po can du
NK036(chi)016:897: gsal ba la / lhag mthong gi rig pa lu gu rgyud ces bya'o //
NK036(chi)016:899: sgron ma'i gnas ni snying yin te //
NK036(chi)016:900: lam ni rtsa chen bzhi yin no //
NK036(chi)016:901: sgo ni mthong byed mig gi sgo //
NK036(chi)016:903: 'di la yang dngos dang cha shas gnyis yod de //
NK036(chi)016:904: dngos ni rdo rje lu gu rgyud nyid yin la /
NK036(chi)016:905: da lta ni dbu ma snying dang 'brel ba la srog gi rlung dang bcas pa der brten cing /
NK036(chi)016:907: kha dog med pa'i kha dog can /
NK036(chi)016:909: mig rgyang zhags chu'i sgron ma'i nang du 'char bar snang ste /
NK036(chi)016:910: phyir snang yang phyi rol na yod pa ma yin no //
NK036(chi)016:911: 'di ni dus 'khor du re kha zhes bshad do //
NK036(chi)016:912: brtan g.yo thams cad gsal ba ni brtan pa ri
NK036(chi)016:913: gling la sogs pa nas sangs rgyas kyi sku'i rnam
NK036(chi)016:914: pa'i bar 'di yi nang du snang ba de mi
NK036(chi)016:916: g.yo ba ni rtog pa cung 'gyu yang 'dis tshor
NK036(chi)016:917: gyi g.yo bar 'gyur gyi dbyibs kyi stong gzugs kyis
NK036(chi)016:918: de gnyis ka'i mtshan nyid mi shes te /
NK036(chi)016:919: de'i phyir rtags bcu ni rnam pa kun ldan yin la /
NK036(chi)016:920: re kha ni bcu ma yin no //
NK036(chi)016:922: rnam dag sgron ma ni 'od lnga ldan no //
NK036(chi)016:923: dang po ni mthing kha khyab pa'o //
NK036(chi)016:924: de'ang mthing kha las mched kha dog lnga zhes so //
NK036(chi)016:926: thig le stong pa'i sgron ma ni /
NK036(chi)016:927: dmar la gsal ba'i thig le chen po rtsa gtems na snang ba ste /
NK036(chi)016:929: thig le chen po'i snang ba 'byung //
NK036(chi)016:932: phyi'i dbyings nam mkha' yin te /
NK036(chi)016:933: de nyams la yang nam mkha' snang /
NK036(chi)016:934: de thams cad stong par mthong ba'o //
NK036(chi)016:935: de ltar phyi dbyings nam mkha' stong pa'o //
NK036(chi)016:937: de ltar gsum ga yang rig pa'i cha shas yin cing /
NK036(chi)016:938: da lta ni mig gi dwangs ma chu yod pa dang /
NK036(chi)016:939: de'i mtha' na 'od lnga'i ris yod pa dang /
NK036(chi)016:940: rtsa stong pa nas rnam par shes pa 'gyu ba rnams kyi rgyu las byung ste /
NK036(chi)016:941: dbyings 'di rnams mig med na mi 'byung ste /
NK036(chi)016:942: 'di rnams rig pa la brten nas snang bas gzhal yas khang du'ang bshad do //
NK036(chi)016:943: rig pa dang 'di gnyis ngo ma shes na /
NK036(chi)016:944: gdams ngag gis khyad mi shes te gsang skor man chad rig pa'i skad yod kyang /
NK036(chi)016:945: dbyings med pa ngo sprod mi shes so //
NK036(chi)016:946: rig pa'i bshad pa rnams dbyings kyi stong gzugs la sbyor te /
NK036(chi)016:947: 'di ni 'khrul te nor bu beed+aur+ya'i yo na tan mching bu la sbyar ba dang mtshungs so //
NK036(chi)016:948: dbyings kyi snang ba 'phel brgyad la gtad cing bsgoms kyang /
NK036(chi)016:949: rig pa dang shes rab rang byung gi sgron ma med na khams gsum las gtan mi thar ro //
NK036(chi)016:951: phyi lha mi'i 'bras bu mthar thug /
NK036(chi)016:952: nang gi 'od gsal lha rnams so //
NK036(chi)016:954: yang 'grel pa nas mi 'gyur ba'i lus rnyed par byed pa la /
NK036(chi)016:955: snang ba 'phel ba 'ba' zhig la bltas na bsam
NK036(chi)016:956: gtan gyi lha'i skye gnas las mi grol ba'i phyir
NK036(chi)016:957: na chos nyid zad pa'i snang ba la ci yang
NK036(chi)016:958: ma grub par gtan la dbab bo //
NK036(chi)016:960: sbyor drug pas kyang re kha 'di ma shes pas /
NK036(chi)016:961: stong gzugs kyi lha mthong ba la mchog 'dzin byed pa 'khrul te /
NK036(chi)016:962: 'di rnams kyi dbye ba dang bshad pa rgyud bcu
NK036(chi)016:963: bdun dang dus 'khor las gsungs pa mang yang 'phros
NK036(chi)016:964: pas chog go // mdor na rig pa ni yul
NK036(chi)016:965: ye shes rang byung gi sgron ma ni yul can
NK036(chi)016:967: de gnyis rnam par dag par ngo sprod cing /
NK036(chi)016:968: nyams su len pa ni gnad yin no //
NK036(chi)016:969: 'di la rgyu rkyen med do zhes bshad pa ni //
NK036(chi)016:970: de gnyis kyi ngo bo yin gyi dbyings kyi snang ba dang /
NK036(chi)016:971: 'khrul pa'i rtog pa mtshan nyid 'dzin pa la rgyu
NK036(chi)016:972: rkyen mthong bzhin du med par byas na nor bar
NK036(chi)016:973: 'gyur ro // dbyings kyi snang ba 'byung ba'i rgyu
NK036(chi)016:974: rkyen snang lugs ye shes lnga la sbyar ba ni
NK036(chi)016:975: 'gyur ro // / slob dpon chen po 'jam dpal
NK036(chi)016:976: bshes gnyen gyi rgya mtsho ar gtad du rgya cher
NK036(chi)016:978: ma 'khrul sngar zhor la bshad kyang 'dir yang cung
NK036(chi)016:980: mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i rig pa la //
NK036(chi)016:981: mtshan nyid yod phyir 'dod pa dang //
NK036(chi)016:982: yul can du bden rtog gis bcings pa de 'khrul pa yin te /
NK036(chi)016:983: de ltar med pa'i phyir ro //
NK036(chi)016:984: mtshan nyid 'dzin pa shes rab rang byung gi sgron
NK036(chi)016:985: ma ni yul thams cad dbyings dang rig pa snang
NK036(chi)016:986: la rang bzhin med pa nyid dang /
NK036(chi)016:987: yul can gnyis 'dzin gyi rtog pa rang sar dag pas /
NK036(chi)016:988: zung 'jug dag pa'i rang bzhin du song ba ni ma 'khrul ba yin te /
NK036(chi)016:990: sprul sku'i ye shes rnam pa gnyis //
NK036(chi)016:991: shes bya ci lta'i gnas lugs shes //
NK036(chi)016:992: ji snyed cig ces don rnams shes //
NK036(chi)016:995: rtog pa nyon mongs dang bcas pa'i dus na 'khrul ba yin la /
NK036(chi)016:996: de rnams kyi 'khrul rkyen bral ba ni ma 'khrul pa yin no //
NK036(chi)016:997: don la 'di kun gzhi zhes bya'o //
NK036(chi)016:998: de yang rang gi lus la gnas pa'i dus na
NK036(chi)016:999: shes pa thams cad bskyed cing rang gsal tsam du
NK036(chi)016:1002: sgrib byed kyi rkyen dang ma bral ba'i dus na 'khrul pa yin la /
NK036(chi)016:1003: de'i ngo bo ni ma 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin du gnas so //
NK036(chi)016:1004: de nas ngo bo ka dag gi gnas lugs te ye shes gsum ldan du yod de /
NK036(chi)016:1005: cha yis ma bgos pa'i rig pa thams ca da
NK036(chi)016:1006: mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bor bzhugs pa ste
NK036(chi)016:1007: / ye shes de yang phra ba'i ye shes su gnas so //
NK036(chi)016:1009: lhag mthong gi rig pa lu gu rgyud ni /
NK036(chi)016:1010: rang gi rig pa nyid kyi rang ngo ye shes
NK036(chi)016:1011: kyi skur ma shes nas phyi ru rtog pa dang
NK036(chi)016:1012: / 'od zer dbyibs dang kha dog la sogs pa
NK036(chi)016:1013: la don med pa'i 'gro ba rigs drug gi yul
NK036(chi)016:1014: / dang / yul can du bzung nas blang dor bya rgyu dang /
NK036(chi)016:1016: de nyid rang gi rig pa rang snang rang grol du goms pa ni ma 'khrul ba zhes bya'o //
NK036(chi)016:1017: thod rgal gyi rig pa la /
NK036(chi)016:1018: nyams su blangs nas tshad du phyin pa'i ming yin
NK036(chi)016:1019: pas 'khrul pa zad pa 'bras bu'i gnas lugs ma
NK036(chi)016:1021: de yang chos bor ba zhes bya /
NK036(chi)016:1024: chos las grol ba ces bya /
NK036(chi)016:1026: 'on kyang yul dang yul can gnyis ka bden par
NK036(chi)016:1027: yod pa'i rtog pa dang mi bden pa gnyis ka'i
NK036(chi)016:1028: rtog pa byung na da lta 'khrul pa'i rig pas
NK036(chi)016:1030: gsum pa nyams len du 'gro ba'i don ni /
NK036(chi)016:1031: dbyings rig mthong ba'i rig pa mngon sum gyi dus
NK036(chi)016:1032: na snang stong dbyer med ngo bo'i 'dug tshul de
NK036(chi)016:1033: la mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i rig pas brtags kyang /
NK036(chi)016:1034: thams cad dang mthun la thams cad ma yin par snang zhing /
NK036(chi)016:1035: sems dang ye shes rang bzhin gcig pa dang tha
NK036(chi)016:1036: dad du bstan du med pa ni don dam dang
NK036(chi)016:1037: kun rdzob kyi gnas lugs thams cad 'dus par thag
NK036(chi)016:1039: de la nyams len skad cig kyang ma bral ba dgos /
NK036(chi)016:1040: bral na skyed med par dbang po'i mngon sum du
NK036(chi)016:1041: mthong bas brtson 'grus shugs la 'byung ba bsgom pa
NK036(chi)016:1042: / de la 'du 'bral med par spyod na sku
NK036(chi)016:1043: dang zhing khams rdul phra rab kyi grangs snang zhing
NK036(chi)016:1044: / / theg chen gyi chos sgra thos la sgo
NK036(chi)016:1045: lnga ma 'gags kyang 'dod pa'i rtog pa med cing
NK036(chi)016:1046: / / / yid la de rnams kyi rnam pa
NK036(chi)016:1047: dang 'dod pa dang gzugs med kyi rtog pa 'khrul
NK036(chi)016:1048: par shes nas rgyu 'bras mkhyen pa'i shes rab skye
NK036(chi)016:1049: zhing mi dge ba bcu'i sems skad cig kyang mi
NK036(chi)016:1050: 'gyu bas na spyod pa zhes bya la /
NK036(chi)016:1051: 'bras bu rang sems ye shes dang 'brel bar mngon du 'gyur ba'i phyir /
NK036(chi)016:1053: rig pa tshad la phebs pa'i tshe /
NK036(chi)016:1054: gsal snang gi cha stong gsum gang ba bltas kyang khyab pa gnyis 'dzin gyi 'khrul pa nub cing /
NK036(chi)016:1055: gang 'dod pa'i dbang 'byor thob nas sems can thams cad kyi don nus shing /
NK036(chi)016:1056: chos thams cad zad pa'i dus na gnyis 'dzin gyi bag chags thams cad dang bral ba ni /
NK036(chi)016:1057: dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi
NK036(chi)016:1058: dgongs pa yin na nyams len de las mchog med
NK036(chi)016:1060: rnam pa 'di nyams su len pa'i lus gnad lta stangs rnams ni dang po'i rkyen tsam yin no //
NK036(chi)016:1061: ngo bo gnad du bsnun pa ni /
NK036(chi)016:1063: dbyings la bstan par bya ba'i phyir //
NK036(chi)016:1064: snang ba kun la rang gzer btab //
NK036(chi)016:1065: ces bya ba dbyings ni sngar bsnan pa ltar nang gi rgyu rkyen las snang ba yin pas /
NK036(chi)016:1066: gzugs sogs snang ba thams cad de dang bsres la tha dad med par nyams su blang ngo //
NK036(chi)016:1067: snang ba logs su bzhag dbyings kyi 'bar ba zla nyi 'od 'ja' tshon thig le sku snang /
NK036(chi)016:1068: logs gcig tu bzhag pas mi yong ngo //
NK036(chi)016:1069: rig pa brtan par bya ba'i phyir //
NK036(chi)016:1070: ngo bo nyid ni rnal du dbab //
NK036(chi)016:1072: rig pa'i dbye ba lnga la mkhas shing rdo rje
NK036(chi)016:1073: lu gu rgyud da lta dbyings dang 'brel ba dang
NK036(chi)016:1074: rtsa nang nas brgyud de shar ba dang /
NK036(chi)016:1075: shar ba dang po rgyang zhags mig gi chu la shar zhing /
NK036(chi)016:1076: de nas phyi nam mkhar snang bas dbyibs dang kha dog du mar snang bar zad kyi /
NK036(chi)016:1077: kho rang ni dang po nas tha ma'i bar du
NK036(chi)016:1078: mi 'gyur zhing thams cad 'gre yang thams cad kyis
NK036(chi)016:1079: ma gos pa yin pa de go bar bya'o //
NK036(chi)016:1080: lta ba brtan par bya ba'i phyir //
NK036(chi)016:1081: rtag tu lu gu rgyud la gzir //
NK036(chi)016:1083: snang stong dbyer med mig la sogs pa'i dbang po yul dang yul can /
NK036(chi)016:1084: shes pa thams cad bzhag pa ni /
NK036(chi)016:1085: gang gi yang mthar ma lhung ba nyid yin te /
NK036(chi)016:1086: gzhan dang lu gu rgyud kyi lta ba gnyis gcig po ma yor so sor bzhag /
NK036(chi)016:1087: gcig zung 'jug tu byed pa'i ma yin no //
NK036(chi)016:1088: shes pa brtan par bya ba'i phyir //
NK036(chi)016:1089: rig pa dbyings su btson du gzung //
NK036(chi)016:1090: zhes pa ni sngar bsgom pa'i gnad bstan pa de yin no //
NK036(chi)016:1091: lus ni brtan par bya ba'i phyir //
NK036(chi)016:1092: 'dug stangs rnam la rang lus sbyang //
NK036(chi)016:1093: ngag ni brtan par bya ba'i phyir //
NK036(chi)016:1094: rtag tu lkugs pa lta bur gnas //
NK036(chi)016:1095: sems ni brtan par bya ba'i phyir //
NK036(chi)016:1096: rtag tu lu gu rgyud la lta //
NK036(chi)016:1098: lus ngag yid kyis 'jig rten gyi bya ba gzhan
NK036(chi)016:1099: rgyab tu lings kyis bskyur la nyams su blang bar
NK036(chi)016:1101: dge ba bcad nas mi dge ba'i lus ngag yid gsum rang dgar 'jog pa ni ma yin no //
NK036(chi)016:1102: snang ba'i 'khrul pa rgyun bcad phyir //
NK036(chi)016:1103: stong pa nyid la goms par bya //
NK036(chi)016:1105: stong gzugs dbyings rig gi snang ba nas chos dang
NK036(chi)016:1106: chos nyid yid la snang ba'i bar thams cad spros
NK036(chi)016:1107: bral stong zhing ma 'gags par sbyang dgos kyis /
NK036(chi)016:1108: stong gzugs 'di bden gyi sangs rgyas 'di rang yin
NK036(chi)016:1109: la snang ba 'di yang ye shes yin pas 'di
NK036(chi)016:1110: la zhen pa gyis byas kyang mi phan pa'i don
NK036(chi)016:1111: no // mdor bsdus na rnam pa kun gyi mchog
NK036(chi)016:1112: dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid mngon du bya ba'i
NK036(chi)016:1113: phyir 'di thams cad brjod pa yin no //
NK036(chi)016:1114: de'i lam gyi drod tshad 'dzin pa la rtags dang tshad bshad pa ni gal che'o //
NK036(chi)016:1115: de yang phyi ru rnal 'byor pa la gzhan gyis mthong ba dang /
NK036(chi)016:1116: rang gis nang nas rtogs pa la dbang thob ma thob kyi tshad dang /
NK036(chi)016:1117: dbyings rig gi snang cha'i rtags gsum 'dzom ma 'dzom lta ba gal che'o //
NK036(chi)016:1118: de gsum ma 'dzom na stong gzugs kyi lha mang yang mi phan /
NK036(chi)016:1119: shes rab che yang mi phan /
NK036(chi)016:1120: lus la rdzu 'phrul byung yang mi phan no //
NK036(chi)016:1121: rgya che bar rgyud gdams ngag las gsungs kyang ma spros so //
NK036(chi)016:1122: 'di ltar nyams su len pa'i gnad ma go bar /
NK036(chi)016:1123: la la rdzogs chen byar med du bshad zer nas lus ngag nyon mongs rang dgar 'jog pa dang /
NK036(chi)016:1124: la la dge sdig la phan gnod med zer nas
NK036(chi)016:1125: sdig spyod dge ba bskyur ba dang la la stong
NK036(chi)016:1126: gzugs dbyings rig mthong bas sangs rgyas yin zer nas
NK036(chi)016:1127: thams cad mkhyen pa'i shes rab la dmod pa dang
NK036(chi)016:1128: / gzhan yang stong pa nyid bsam du med zer nas gti mug tu 'jog pa dang /
NK036(chi)016:1129: la la sangs rgyas kyi rgyud rig bya dang rtog
NK036(chi)016:1130: ge yang yin zer nas stong pa nyid la gshe
NK036(chi)016:1131: pa dang / la la stong brkyang gis sangs rgyas
NK036(chi)016:1132: thob zer nas rang 'jig rten gyi dngos po la
NK036(chi)016:1133: pa dang / spyod pa dang / mdor na phyogs
NK036(chi)016:1134: re la zhen pa dpag tu med pa yod kyang
NK036(chi)016:1135: pa dang / spyod pa dang / / de thams
NK036(chi)016:1136: cad log lta dang 'jig tshogs dang mthar 'dzin dang
NK036(chi)016:1137: pa dang / spyod pa dang / / / ma
NK036(chi)016:1138: rig pa'i skor bzlog rkyang pa yin pas bdud kyis
NK036(chi)016:1140: bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad par rtsa ba drug pa ni /
NK036(chi)016:1141: 'di brjod thabs dang shes rab dbyer med brtson 'grus ldan //
NK036(chi)016:1142: spangs thob bral gang rnam kun mchog ldan de thob bya //
NK036(chi)016:1143: gzhan la tshig ngan brjod min log par mthong gyur nas //
NK036(chi)016:1144: nged la zer cing lta ngan zhugs te len par byung srid na /
NK036(chi)016:1145: bzod par mdzod cig des kyang sems ma zhi na dmyal bar song //
NK036(chi)016:1146: mtha' bral thabs kyis brgyan pa rang byung rnams kyi dgongs pa yin //
NK036(chi)016:1147: bzhi pa 'bras bu ni sku gsum gzhi la bzhugs pa /
NK036(chi)016:1148: ngo bo rang bzhin thugs rje gsum /
NK036(chi)016:1149: des lam du byas pa de gsum gyi bya ba ci yod kyi bar yin la /
NK036(chi)016:1150: de 'bras bur gyur pa thams cad kyi 'khrul pa
NK036(chi)016:1151: dag pa yin pas gzhung rnams nas rgya cher gsungs
NK036(chi)016:1153: de rnams 'dir 'phros pa bshad pa yin no //
NK036(chi)016:1154: de ltar bstan cing shes nas nyams su len pa ni /
NK036(chi)016:1155: rtag tu khyim med ri khrod 'grim //
NK036(chi)016:1156: zhes bya ba ni bya ba btang nas dben pa brten pa'o //
NK036(chi)016:1157: mtshan du rang gi gnas khang du //
NK036(chi)016:1158: nyin mo bzhin tu lta zhing brtag /
NK036(chi)016:1159: ces pa ni mun pa'i rnal 'byor te /
NK036(chi)016:1160: rgya mtsho ar gtad kyi gnad shes par byas la bsgom mo //
NK036(chi)016:1161: nyin par ri khrod gcan gzan bzhin //
NK036(chi)016:1164: de ltar byed pa'i skyes bu ni //
NK036(chi)016:1165: sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po dang //
NK036(chi)016:1166: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya'o //
NK036(chi)016:1167: zhes pas nyams su blang ba gal che'o //
NK036(chi)016:1168: de nas snang ba gong 'phel rim pas 'byung ba'i
NK036(chi)016:1169: gzhung dang rtags tshad rnams rim pas sbyar la lta'o
NK036(chi)016:1170: // rig pa mngon sum gyi don bstan pa ste dgu pa'o //
NK036(chi)016:1171: de man chod ni rig pa'i rgyab brten dang 'gal ba bsdus pa dang /
NK036(chi)016:1177: dge sdig bsdus pa rnams rig pa rdo rje lu
NK036(chi)016:1178: gu rgyud la nges shes bskyed pa'i rgyab brten yin
NK036(chi)016:1180: bi ma la'i 'grel pa gnyis sbyar la bshad do //
NK036(chi)016:1181: spyi'i don go bar byed pa la dung yig can gal che'o //
NK036(chi)016:1182: bstan pa'i bu gcig ni bcangs pa yon tan 'byung ba'o //
NK036(chi)016:1183: mdor na rgyud bcu bdun 'grel pa gdams ngag dang bcas pa dang /
NK036(chi)016:1184: man ngag brgya dang bcu dgu po rnams la lta'o //
NK036(chi)016:1185: spros pa med pa rnams la khrid yig 'di dang /
NK036(chi)016:1186: zangs yig can rtsa ba dang /
NK036(chi)016:1187: 'grel pa dum bu gnyis pa de dang /
NK036(chi)016:1188: rtags dang tshad rnams kyis chog go //
NK036(chi)016:1189: gzhan la ston na dbang rnam dgos so //
NK036(chi)016:1190: yan lag khregs chod bdun pa dang /
NK036(chi)016:1194: rnam rtog thog bardzisa gnyis kyang nyams len gyi grogs su 'agro'o //
NK036(chi)016:1195: zangs yig can ma'i khrid kyi rim pa dum bu bcu pa rdzogs so //
NK036(chi)016:1196: rgyal bas gsungs pa'i dam chos kun gyi bcud //
NK036(chi)016:1197: lung dang rtog par 'brel ba gsang sngags don //
NK036(chi)016:1198: rdzogs rim snying phyung mngon sum lta ba'i gdan //
NK036(chi)016:1199: man ngag debs dang mthun par bdag gis bsdebs //
NK036(chi)016:1200: yi ge rnams la bltas pa'i rtog dpyod min //
NK036(chi)016:1201: bdag ni bi ma la yis byin gyis brlabs //
NK036(chi)016:1202: karma'i yang dgon dben par 'dug pa'i tshe //
NK036(chi)016:1203: nam langs dus mthar shar gyi phyogs rol nas //
NK036(chi)016:1204: lta bas mi ngoms 'od kyi mdzes pa na //
NK036(chi)016:1205: mngon sum ltar snang bdag gis mdzod spur thim //
NK036(chi)016:1206: de nas 'bad med gnad 'di thams cad go //
NK036(chi)016:1207: 'di ni chos kun mthun zhing khyad par du //
NK036(chi)016:1208: mngon sum rig pa'i khyad kyis 'phags pa yin //
NK036(chi)016:1209: de ltar yi ger bkod par mi 'os kyang //
NK036(chi)016:1210: nyams su len dang gzhan la phan byed pa 'i //
NK036(chi)016:1211: skyes chen du mas bskul nas sbyar ba yin //
NK036(chi)016:1212: dge bas chos kun zad sar phyin gyur cig /
NK036(chi)016:1213: rang byung rdo rje rang byung gi //
NK036(chi)016:1214: ye shes mngon ston yi ge sbyar //
NK036(chi)016:1215: lung don bshad na zad pa med //
NK036(chi)016:1216: spros pa chod na nyams su longs //
NK036(chi)016:1217: bya lo zla ba drug pa la sbyar ba'o //
NK036(chi)016:1218: gdams dag 'di shes min mi shes min rnams la sba bar byas la /
NK036(chi)016:1219: skal ldan nyams len byed pa rnams la bstan par bya'o //
NK036(chi)016:1220: dam tshig dang ldan pa rnams la bka' srung rnams kyis bka' khrol la stong grogs mdzod cig /
NK036(chi)016:1221: dam med log par lta ba rnams la chad par 'bab bo //
NK036(chi)016:1222: bkra shis dpal 'bar ye shes rgyas 'bar 'dzam gling mdzes pa'i rgyan du shog /
NK036(chi)016:1223: na mo bi ma la mi tra b+h+yahmachoda brjod sdom ldan dbang thab rgyud smin cing //
NK036(chi)016:1225: nges 'byung snying rje che ldan pa byang chub sems sbyong //
NK036(chi)016:1226: rtsa rlung gi thig le gnad du bsnun //
NK036(chi)016:1228: chos kun spros bral khregs chod kyi khrid don rig gnas //
NK036(chi)016:1229: snang ba sems shes snang srid gnyis /
NK036(chi)016:1231: dben par seng ge 'dug stangs gsum glang chen dang //
NK036(chi)016:1232: drang srong lta bu lus kyi gnad //
NK036(chi)016:1233: steng 'og zur la lta stangs gsum ma 'gyur lta //
NK036(chi)016:1234: mkha' la dbyings dang ngo sprad rig pa gsum rig pa tshad //
NK036(chi)016:1235: snang dang mched rnams gong 'phel rig dang tshad du phyin //
NK036(chi)016:1236: shes rab rang byung sgron ma yis phyi nang rig pa //
NK036(chi)016:1237: kun mthong chos zad mthar 'bras bu thug thob //
NK036(chi)016:1238: sangs rgyas kun gyi mjug sdud rtogs pa'i gnad //
NK036(chi)016:1239: tshig gsum gnad dril snying thig la //
NK036(chi)016:1240: rgyud lung kun na 'di las med //
NK036(chi)016:1241: rang byung gis bstan nyams len mdzod //
NK036(chi)016:1242: rdzogs pa chen po tshig bzhi bi ma la yis byin gyis brlabs pa /
NK036(chi)016:1243: rang byung rdo rjes bstan pa 'di /
NK036(chi)016:1244: skal ldan rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi bya ba spongs la nyams su longs shig /
NK036(chi)016:1245: bka' srung rnams kyis gnyer mdzod cig /
